profile_positions.description:
Function: Global Operations Manager 
In this function I was responsible for delivering Atos Global infrastructure Services to our customer NXP Semiconductors. I defined and implemented a new global service delivery organization. 

Global Infrastructure Service was delivered by multi-cultural support teams from different countries: India, Thailand, Malaysia, Poland, Germany, United Kingdom, China, France, the United States of America and the Netherlands. 

Key activities:
-	People management (Delivery team of 160+ FTE)
-	Global Operations and Service delivery for:
o	NXP Datacenter Services at 28 locations for manufacturing (production) and engineering (Design & Development) 
o	NXP Workplace Services at 34 locations for 13.000+ seats including:
Service desk (6 Languages) , Managed Client Device, Packaging & scripting, Tooling Services.
o	NXP Corporate IT services Including: 260 servers for: SAP, Oracle and Cloud Services, Workload management and B2Biod (message transfer as a service)
-	P&L responsible for Global services and upselling (35 Mio euro/ year ) including budget and outlook process)
-	Global Governance with NXP to discuss Operational performance, Technology roadmaps, and projects.
-	Security and Compliancy management for Global services including Audit support 

Main projects:
-	Set-up of a global service delivery organization for datacenter and workplace services:
o	Workplace Service desks implementation (Malaysia and Poland)
o	Workplace 2nd line support workplace in Malaysia
o	Datacenter services: Server/Storage/Database/Citrix/VMware management in India
o	Local workplace and datacenter services at Manchester, Hamburg and Nijmegen
o	Global process support organization in Atos Eindhoven
-	Insourcing of NXP employees for Datacenter services and workplace services
-	Transform and align in-house NXP services towards AtosOrigin portfolio services
-	Transfer of support services from Atos Thailand to Atos India.
profile_positions.title: Global Account Delivery Manager for NXP

Within AtosEuronext Amsterdam I responsible for the IT operations of Euronext NL.

Main projects:

profile_positions.description:
Function: Service Engineer 
I joined Digital Equipment Corporation (DEC) in the summer of 1987 as a participant of the DECollege program. This one-year program (Bachelor degree level) had the objective to develop graduates as service engineer for High-End computer services. Within this program I learned several programming skills, networking, and hardware and software maintenance. After successful completion of this program I started as a service engineer in the Amsterdam branch. 
I performed many roles during this period like: Pre-sales consultant, Network Fault finding specialist, PC integration engineer, VAX/VMS hardware/software engineer and responsible service engineer for several customers like the Amsterdam Stock Exchange and European Option Exchange in Amsterdam. In 1995 The Amsterdam Stock Exchange offered me a position which I accepted.
